name: Slime Splat
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move
DOWN Arrow Key to Attack
RIGHT Arrow Key to Shoot Slime (If you pick up slime balls)
WALL JUMP off slime splats that land on walls.
PICK UP BLOCKS with S key when standing on a block
THROW BLOCK with DOWN Arrow Key
HOLD SHIFT to PUSH Blocks

This is a single level game I plan to develop in the future, Comments and Feedback welcome.
